solution_line_template: The walk from the bus stop to his house will take Harry {total_bus_journey_time} / {walk_time_divisor} = <<{total_bus_journey_time}/{walk_time_divisor}={walk_time}>>{walk_time} minutes.
So he will have been traveling for {total_bus_journey_time} + {walk_time} = <<{total_bus_journey_time}+{walk_time}={total_travel_time}>>{total_travel_time} minutes.
